plot: A true story of a naive Chinese girl who is forced to confront betrayal after she awakes in a remote forest covered in blood.
title: Ni Jing: No Robarás
plot_es: A true story of a naive Chinese girl who is forced to confront betrayal after she awakes in a remote forest covered in blood.
original_name: Ni Jing: Thou Shalt Not Steal
plot_en: A true story of a naive Chinese girl who is forced to confront betrayal after she awakes in a remote forest covered in blood.
